description: A water city known for its skilled shipwrights and unique architecture built on canals. Home to the Galley-La Company and site of the Straw Hats' ship construction.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Rest at Water 7
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew rests in Water 7 after the Enies Lobby arc, recovering while their new ship is built.
keyEvents.significance: Water 7 serves as a safe haven for the crew's recovery and preparation.

keyEvents.title: Garp Arrives at Water 7
keyEvents.description: Marine Vice-Admiral Garp arrives at Water 7 with his fleet, disrupting the crew's peace.
keyEvents.significance: Garp's arrival brings tension and sets up major revelations.

statusHistory.reason: Water 7 is rebuilding after Aqua Laguna with help from Oimo and Kashii

name.japanese: ガレーラカンパニー本社

description: The main headquarters of the Galley-La Company, Water 7's premier shipbuilding company. Led by Iceburg, mayor of Water 7.

keyEvents.title: Crew Rests at Galley-La Headquarters
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats recover in special quarters at Galley-La headquarters provided by Iceburg.
keyEvents.significance: The headquarters serves as a safe haven for the crew's recovery.

keyEvents.title: Garp Punches Through Wall
keyEvents.description: Garp demonstrates his immense strength by punching through the headquarters' wall to reach Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Garp's overwhelming power and casual disregard for property.

statusHistory.reason: Building is operational, housing the Straw Hats during ship construction
